item.description: Please respond as soon as possible so I can let Cafe Indigo know how many to expect. Even if you have already replied to the other email you still need to rsvp again. I browsed their brunch menu the other day and they have pancakes, waffles, tofu scramble and much more for only $15. Included in the price is a buffet of vegan desserts.
item.how_to_find_us: We will have a reserved table
item.name: February 2009 meetup
